ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of absence to the Hon. Joe E. Hershfield
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. JOE E. HERSHFIELD, a judge of the Tax Court of Canada from August 1, 2013 to February 3, 2014, on account of ill-health.
AttachmentsAttachment
